title: #276: Don't F**ck With Cats with Deanna Thompson and John Green
description:
We go behind the scenes of the Emmy award winning Netflix documentary "Don't F**k With Cats" with online sleuthers Deanna Thompson (Baudi Moovan) and John Green. 


We talk about their detailed and exhaustive investigation, the highs and the lows and the evolution of serial killers including how to spot the warning signs for early intervention and prevention opportunities in both the virtual and real world. You won't want to miss this.

#HisNameWasJunLin
